articles.author: Emily Kaplan
articles.title: Predators prospect Prokop announces he is gay
articles.description: Predators prospect Luke Prokop has become the first active player under NHL contract to say he is gay, telling ESPN that he wanted to share this publicly to help him play his best hockey.
articles.content:
Nashville Predators prospect Luke Prokop on Monday became the first active player under NHL contract to come out as gay.
Prokop, 19, made the announcement in an Instagram post.

articles.title: Grealish, Kane, Varane among summer's biggest sagas to be resolved
articles.description: With the new club season in Europe's top leagues around the corner, we assess the state of play of the transfer sagas still waiting to be settled.
